Entries.summer_Mon8: Oh, Tristan is positively infuriating! Do you know what he did the other day?#$b#Oh, you would not believe it!
Entries.fall_Sat6: Tristan insisted on giving Baron Munchington a fish. A fish?!#$b#Oh, the poor boy did not know what to do with it, and made a horrible mess!#$b#I shall not return inside until it is all cleaned up.

Entries.spring_23_2: Hello @! I cannot chat. I am most horrendously busy preparing arrangements for the dance tomorrow.#$b#I do hope you shall attend, for I am somewhat eager to dance with you.

Entries.MateoPain: Have you heard? Something terrible happened to that scruffy rabscallion, Mateo!$2#$b#I should send them flowers, don't you think? Or is that too presumptuous?$3
